abstract: Study published in The New England Journal of Medicine finds that children who were exposed to cancer treatment during last two trimesters of their mother's pregnancy had normal cognitive and cardiac function.
lead_paragraph: Tests on children go against the prevailing wisdom of counseling women to deliver preterm or even terminate pregnancy before chemotherapy.

headline.main: Study Offers Support for Cancer Treatment During Pregnancy
headline.print_headline: Study Offers Support for Cancer Treatment In Much of Pregnancy

snippet: Tests on children go against the prevailing wisdom of counseling women to deliver preterm or even terminate pregnancy before chemotherapy.
